name: Sheep Legion 1 - no ads
description:
【On sale 50% off】
◆(○^～^○)On sale 50% off for a limited time，September 1～September 30!

【No ads edition】
◆No annoying advertisements,have fun!

【Single-player Game 】
◆Don't need an internet connection! The most amazing single-player RPG is on your iPhone ,iPod,and iPad!Thank you very much, every player!We will continue to work hard in the future to update the game.

【Cast Polymorph】
◆Monsters are too powerful! Don't worry, they can temporarily be turned into a sheep.

【Command an army】
◆There are a variety of roles in the army:warrior,archer,mage,priest,necromancer and eagle.

【Fight with dragon】
◆You will fight with a dangerous, fire-breathing dragon.

【Game center support】
◆Connect with Game Center to find friends and compare high scores!The top 10 of the player's name will be displayed real time in the game.Who is the most powerful player?

【More】
◆And..... more to come!
